ygData.subject: New to Everquest.......
ygData.msgSnippet: I got this game yesterday as a gift from my daughter. I figured out some of it, but i guess i really screwed up. My daughter is level 54 and gave me a bunch of
ygData.messageBody:
I got this game yesterday as a gift from my
daughter. I figured out some of it, but i guess i really
screwed up. My daughter is level 54 and gave me a bunch
of stuff and after she left, some creature killed me
in level 2 and i didn't know i had to go back and
get all my stuff, so i just stopped for the night and
now i find out i lost all my stuff....i'm really
bummed. I'm not sure i'm gonna like this game.
